steps.title: Increase the intensity with occasional breaks.
steps.subtitle: Pull away for a moment to look into your partner's eyes, whisper something in his or her ear, or simply catch your breath and marvel at your good fortune.
sub-points: Instead of putting a damper on the action, these small moments can actually make kissing . It gives your partner the sense that you see him or her as a complete person, and not simply something to kiss.
